title: How to install HP printer on Windows 10 - Quora

response.answer_text: just plug it in via usb drivers will auto install For some reason they do not then you must download the driver from the manufacturers support website. Disconnect your printer temporarily. Lonely installer and follow the on-screen directions. Depending on the model you may need USB cable to transfer a wireless connection setup details from your PC to the printer all of the set of problems from major manufacturers the step-by-step guide for installation
